participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: caring and reflective, with a focus on community service and personal growth.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Tina
participant_2.personality: energetic and nostalgic, with a passion for dance and pop culture from her childhood.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s.
